message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the product, $18,000 is out of my price range.  I'm interested in buying, but I can only offer $8,000 at this time.
I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit, so I'll meet you at $12,000.
Alice, $12,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can only go up to $9,000.  Let me know if that works for you.
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to meet me halfway, so I'll meet you at $10,500. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
